name: Sync and Image Caching Bug Fixes

userStories.title: Fix Elevation Plot Images Disappearing on Navigation
userStories.description: As a user, I want Elevation Plot images to remain visible when I navigate away from the page and return, so that I don't lose track of my work during sync operations.
acceptanceCriteria: Elevation Plot images persist after navigating away and returning to the page
Images remain visible even when sync is in progress
LocalImageService is integrated for caching blob URLs
IndexedDB caching is implemented for offline persistence
ionViewWillEnter lifecycle hook restores cached images
Pattern matches the working Structural Systems implementation

userStories.title: Fix FDF Photos Not Syncing
userStories.description: As a user, I want FDF photos to successfully sync to the server when I click 'Sync Now', so that my photos are not lost and are available across devices.
acceptanceCriteria: FDF photos in sync queue are processed when 'Sync Now' is clicked
FDF photos successfully upload to the server
FDF photos are removed from sync queue after successful sync
Sync status is accurately reflected in the UI

userStories.title: Fix FDF Captions Stuck in Sync Queue
userStories.description: As a user, I want FDF photo captions to sync along with their photos, so that my caption text is preserved and visible on the server.
acceptanceCriteria: FDF captions sync successfully with their associated photos
Captions are not stuck indefinitely in the sync queue
Caption metadata is included in the photo sync payload
Captions appear correctly on the server after sync
